unnormalised: Hey! Any news on Jadeja? Hope he recovers soon. Heard Bumrah's been doing physiotherapy at the NCA since 20/07/2024. Any word on his return by 10/08/2024? We need him for the Asia Cup! Also, what about that hamstring injury for Dhawan, is it still bad after 2 weeks? Hope he's fit before 15/08/2024, Independence Day match! Jai Hind!
normalised: Hey! Any news on Jadeja? Hope he recovers soon. Heard Bumrah's been doing physiotherapy at the N C A since twentieth july two thousand and twenty four. Any word on his return by tenth august two thousand and twenty four? We need him for the Asia Cup! Also, what about that hamstring injury for Dhawan, is it still bad after two weeks? Hope he's fit before fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four, Independence Day match! Jai Hind!
